dcterms:creator: B. Donnot
dcterms:description: A testbed platform to model sequential decision making in power systems, providing realistic chronics and underlying power flow backends for benchmarking DRL agents.
dcterms:title: Grid2Op environment

dcterms:creator: G. Serré
E. Boguslawski
B. Donnot
A. Pavão
I. Guyon
A. Marot
dcterms:description: A challenge design focused on reinforcement learning for future energy systems and carbon neutrality, utilizing the WCCI 2022 L2RPN environment.
dcterms:title: WCCI 2022 L2RPN environment

dcterms:creator: M. Lehna
C. Holzhüter
S. Tomforde
C. Scholz
dcterms:description: A dataset containing observations from the IEEE118 grid, used to analyze agent failures and predict potential failures in power grid operations.
dcterms:title: IEEE118 grid

dcterms:creator: M. Lehna
C. Holzhüter
S. Tomforde
C. Scholz
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising over 40,000 observations of failed chronics from different agents, used for clustering and forecasting failure types in power grids.
dcterms:title: Data of over 40k failed chronics
